RADIO

June 23, 1953
My dear Mies King*
I don#t feel that it would be fair for me
to recommend one particular recording company*
There are so many in Newlork. However, I
personally have used the Gotham Recording
Corp*, at 2 West U6th Street, Hew York City,
and know of their good service*
Most recording machines are AC, but it is
possible to use DC current by means of a
converter*
Sincerely yours.
Miss Ethel M* King
12 East 86th Street
New York 28, N*T*
